Title: 195: Going on-call 🚨
Description:
Have you ever gone on on-call rotations for your company? What is on-call? How
to operate a successful on-call strategy? What does on-call for mobile mean? What are some tools and
resources to help with on-call rotations?

In this episode Donn and Kaushik dive into these topics.

Shownotes

  • Firebase Crashlytics
  • Rollbar Integration
  • Ops Genie
  • Pager Duty
  • Statuspage.io
  • Status.io
  • Keyboard Maestro

Good resources

  • What happens when the pager goes off?
  • Why Your Engineering Teams need Incident Commanders

Steps to handle on-call

  1. Triage
  2. Coordinate
  3. Mitigate
  4. Resolve
  5. Follow up (Root Cause Analysis or Post Mortem)
